summary: This document is an email chain from August 11, 2019, containing a forwarded message from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The forwarded message, dated August 10, 2019, describes a visit with inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on the previous Thursday, noting his mood, requests, and planned meeting with his attorneys. The email is sent shortly after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate at MCC New York who was visited in the SHU, described as making various requests and planning to meet with his attorneys.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.role: Associate Warden at MCC New York
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded message describing the visit with Jeffrey Epstein in the SHU.

connections.description: The Associate Warden visited and assessed inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

events.title: Visit with Epstein in SHU
events.description: An Associate Warden visited inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York. Epstein was getting ready to meet with his attorneys, had a cell mate, denied any suicidal thoughts, and made various requests.

events.title: Forwarded message about Epstein visit
events.description: The Associate Warden's message describing the August 8 visit with Epstein was forwarded via email.

events.title: Email correspondence about Epstein
events.description: An email chain was sent containing the forwarded message about the visit with Epstein, dated August 10, 2019.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was visited in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York on Thursday, August 8, 2019.
During the visit, Epstein denied any suicidal thoughts or intentions and showed no signs of distress, anxiety, or depression.
Epstein was making requests to be moved to general population, for social calls without speaker phones, and to retrieve a book from the suicide watch area.
Epstein had a cell mate at the time of the visit and was planning to meet with his attorneys to work on his legal situation.
This correspondence was sent on August 11, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death, indicating it was part of post-incident information gathering.
